/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and urban architecture. The sky above is a clear blue, adding a serene backdrop to the bustling cityscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the grandeur of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
